titleStmt.title: Diæ Veneris 12 May, 1648. Resolved by the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled, that Wednesday next to be appointed a day of publique thanksgiving to almighty God for his great mercy and blessing, ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright at the Kings Head, in the Old-Bayley,
